headline: PayPal Holdings, Inc. (PYPL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on PayPal Holdings, Inc. on Global Equity Briefing’s Substack by Ray Myers. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PYPL. PayPal Holdings, Inc.’s share was trading at $62.90 as of December 2nd. PYPL’s trailing and forward P/E were 12.59 and 10.79 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. PayPal Holdings (PYPL), a […]

headline: Did PayPal’s AI-Native Checkout Push with Perplexity Just Shift PayPal Holdings’ (PYPL) Investment Narrative?
summary: Ashley and Newegg recently announced fully transactional shopping experiences inside AI answer engines like Perplexity, using PayPal to support seamless checkout from search through payment within conversational interfaces. These launches highlight how PayPal is embedding its payment rails directly into AI-driven shopping journeys, potentially reshaping how merchants connect with customers inside emerging agentic commerce platforms. Now we’ll examine how PayPal’s deeper integration into...
